actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes the establishment of the Knife River Indian Villages National Historical Site in North Dakota. Authorizes to be appropriated not to exceed $600,000 for the acquisition of lands and interests and an amount not to exeeed $2,268,000 for development of the site.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site.
